channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OrganiGram purchasing Motif Labs to become Canada‚Äôs largest cannabis company by market share, as others retreat
item.description: OrganiGram to pay up to C$100 million ($70.7 million) for vape and prerolled cannabis specialist Motif.

item.title: Number of 401(k) plan and IRA millionaires hits record, with more millennials joining the ranks
item.description: Retirement 401(k) plan account balances increased for the fourth straight quarter to reach thehighest average on record, according to Fidelity.

item.description: Beauty and cosmetics company‚Äôs latest earnings cheered investors and at least 17 analysts hiked stock price targets.

item.title: Here‚Äôs where the jobs are for November 2024 ‚Äì in one chart
item.description: Health care and social assistance led the way yet again last month, seeing 72,300 new positions added in that area, per the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

item.title: European shares edge higher amid French political uncertainty; Direct Line up 7%
item.description: European stocks edged upward on Friday, as investors continued to monitor political instability in France and beyond.

item.title: Consumer sentiment rises in December, so do inflation concerns
item.description: Short-term inflation readings hit highest level in six months as Democrats worry higher inflation from tariffs

item.title: Payrolls increased 227,000 in November, more than expected; unemployment rate at 4.2%
item.description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to rise 214,000 in November, according to the Dow Jones consensus forecast.

item.title: Introducing Converge, where leadership meets innovation
item.description: CNBC's brand-new platform for inspiring growth explores the intersection of investment, innovation, sustainability and leadership with the world's most influential leaders including Sir Richard Branson, Nile Rodgers and Stella McCartney

item.title: Oil prices on track for weekly loss after OPEC+ fails to soothe supply worries
item.description: Oil futures fell Friday and were on track for weekly losses a day after a decision by the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies to further postpone a planned unwind of production cuts failed to soothe fears of a crude surplus.

item.title: Uber will offer robotaxi rides in Abu Dhabi through partnership with WeRide
item.description: Uber said robotaxi rides will be available between Saadiyat Island and Yas Island, as well as routes to and from Zayed International Airport.

item.title: Payrolls increased 227,000 in November, more than expected; unemployment rate at 4.2%
item.description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to rise 214,000 in November, according to the Dow Jones consensus forecast.

item.title: AMC enters agreement with Goldman to sell up to 50 million shares
item.description: AMC plans to use the proceeds from the sale of up to 50 million shares to ‚Äúelevate and differentiate the movie-going experience‚Äù at its theaters.

item.title: Wealthy Americans are still ducking the IRS crackdown on non-filers
item.description: Tens of thousands of wealthy Americans are not complying with recently revamped IRS efforts to get them to file tax returns.

item.title: WHO sends experts to help Congo diagnose mystery disease
item.description: The WHO said on Friday it is deploying experts to support health authorities in the Democratic Republic of the Congo to investigate an as-yet undiagnosed disease in a remote area of the country.
